Description: The top rallycross variant formerly known as RX Supercar, competes in formerly World RX and now ERX and BRX. Equipped with 2.0L 4-cylinder engine, 3.4 bar anti-lag turbo with 45mm restrictor, all-wheel drive and 5-speed sequential gearbox. This variant uses stick shifter and RX1 config gauge. RX1 spec has about 300mm of damper travel, all-round tyre and superb agility.
